Date:


The Chief Manager

Andhra Bank,

Opera House Branch,

Mumbai - 400 004.


Sub: Submission of Bank Set of documents against Advance Remittance of USD {{ doc.rounded_total }} DT: {{ doc.get_formatted("delivery_date") }} from our client {{ doc.customer_name }}

Dear sir,

With reference to the above,enclosing herewith set of documents including Original Exchange Control copy of shipping bill against below shipment:


Invoice No. {{ doc.sales_order }}


Date: {{ doc.get_formatted("delivery_date") }}


Amount: {{ doc.rounded_total }}


Consignee: {{ doc.customer_name }}


Payment Terms: {{ doc.payment_terms }}


We have dispatched the original set of documents directly to the above consignee as usual today, after receipt of payment from them.


Kindly acknowledge the receipt of above documents & oblige.


Thanking you,




YOURS FAITHFULLY,


For EXOTIC FRUITS PVT. LTD.



AUTHORISED SIGNATORY.



Encl:As above
